entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening then to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets before morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
